Person & Place

Once a week (and sometimes less frequently as I am lazy) you will get a diptych of a person Crystal met and had an encounter with plus an image from the context in which they were discovered. All straight to your inbox. You can even reply.

LATEST POST

Bring her forward! Listen. Strange women lying in ponds distributing swords is no basis for a system of government. Supreme executive power derives from a mandate from the masses, not from some farcical aquatic ceremony. Shut up! Will you shut up?! Well, what do you want? Now, look here, my good man. Well, we did do the nose.

And this isn't my nose. This is a false one. And this isn't my nose. This is a false one. The swallow may fly south with the sun, and the house martin or the plover may seek warmer climes in winter, yet these are not strangers to our land. What a strange person. I have to push the pram a lot. We found them.

But you are dressed as one… What a strange person. Where'd you get the coconuts? The swallow may fly south with the sun, and the house martin or the plover may seek warmer climes in winter, yet these are not strangers to our land. Shh! Knights, I bid you welcome to your new home. Let us ride to Camelot! He hasn't got shit all over him.

Now, look here, my good man. We want a shrubbery!! I have to push the pram a lot. You can't expect to wield supreme power just 'cause some watery tart threw a sword at you!
